name: @magda/db-migrator
description: A base Docker image for PostgreSQL with Flyway for schema migrations.

scripts.make-latest: bash -c "docker tag data61/magda-postgres:$npm_package_version data61/magda-postgres:latest && docker push data61/magda-postgres:latest"

docker.name: data61/magda-db-migrator
docker.include: Dockerfile flyway-commandline-4.2.0-linux-x64.tar.gz migrate.sh node_modules/@magda/authorization-db/sql node_modules/@magda/registry-datastore/sql node_modules/@magda/session-store/sql node_modules/@magda/discussions-db/sql
